name: MM Google Connection
author: Rodrigo Techera

sections.description:
This Plugin Allow you to have Google Social Login in your site

Special Settings

A section is added to your Settings menu, allowing you to configure your credentials and the styles for the button.
sections.installation:
1. Download MM Google Connect.
  2. Upload the ‘mm-google-connect’ directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…)
  3. Activate MM Google Connect from your Plugins page.
  4. Create a new Project here https://console.developers.google.com/project.
  5. In the sidebar under “APIs & auth”, select Credentials, and click the OAuth consent screen tab.
  6. Choose an Email Address, specify a Product Name, and click Save.
  7. Add a OAuth 2.0 Client ID filling the field Authorized redirect URIs with your domain.
  8. Take the Client ID and Client Secret from your recent created App, and complete the fields in your settings.

short_description: This Plugin Allow you to have Google Social Login in your site.
